name: The Kawoshin Game (Evangelion Fan VN)
description:
This is a small project I created with Ren'Py for fun in about a day, so it's very short... but I think its funny. I might plan on releasing an update in the future with more/custom sprites, sfx, music, and even add more endings!

There are several endings already in the game, and while easy to get, i hope you have fun discovering them all. :) 

Game should run on Mac, Windows, and Linux.

Disclaimer:

All images belong to their rightful owners, I plan on making NO money from this game, it's just a fan project.  Nothing in this game is official nor canon to the Evangelion franchise.
